context: chronic tonsillitis with symptomatic tonsil and adenoid hypertrophy.
chronic tonsillitis with symptomatic tonsil and adenoid hypertrophy.
the tonsils were 3+ enlarged and cryptic.
the tonsil was removed with the gold laser.
both tonsillar fossae were injected with 0.25% marcaine with adrenaline.
the patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.
